# PR4347 Waste Neutralization System Tender

## Project Details

* Solicitation Number: WS3724613812
* Publication Date: 2022-11-03
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-25, 2 PM (EST)
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-16

## Project Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is seeking a supplier to provide a skid-mounted waste neutralization system to treat acidic and basic waste from their Ottawa, ON research facility. The system will be installed in the basement of the research facility, where there are limited space constraints and specific routing requirements.

## Requirements

The supplier must provide:

* A skid-mounted waste neutralization system, including all hardware, accessories, and operational software
* Documentation and user manuals
* Virtual installation support
* Verification, startup, and training services
* A one-year warranty, including maintenance and support services

## Technical Specifications

The system must meet the following technical requirements:

* Utilize gravity-fed wastewater
* Comply with all specifications outlined in the procurement document
* Operate within specific space constraints and routing requirements

## Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Stephen Van Den Hanenberg, PSPC
	+ Phone: [Not provided]
	+ Email: stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Note to suppliers: The system must meet all the specified requirements, and the supplier is responsible for providing all necessary documentation, support, and services. The successful supplier will be responsible for ensuring compliance with all relevant regulations and standards.

Please refer to the original tender document for further information and requirements. The tender closing date is November 25, 2022, 2 PM (EST). Suppliers must submit their bids electronically through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website by the closing date and time.
